name: Charly Mendez
text: Our family definitely enjoyed the pizza.  The dough was just right and the ingredients had a great fresh taste.  We will definitely order more pizzas from Mountain Mike's Pizza.  We are looking forward to trying other items on the menu too. ‚Ä¶More

name: Jenn Buck
text: Great food and great customer service! I was cautious to try due to comments on social media. I'm so glad we gave this place a chance! Our new pizza spot. I got the gluten free crust and it was so delicious! We also did the delivery and the girl was so sweet! Thank you for a great experience.

name: Mark Ramos
text: Man this is the new pizza spot....lil ceasers aint got nothing on this place.everyone is saying its to expensive  but I say the price us right!!!....good food aint cheap!!!!...in all a 10 all the way across

name: Frankie's Adventure's
text: 2 stars flavor was ok I literally just got my order surprised af it was my first time, a small was really small and pricey the wings were good and my 2 litter pepsi,they forgot it almost $4 for a 2 litter and they didn't bring it 2nd pizza ‚Ä¶More

name: Julio Garcia
text: Wayyyyy over priced not good at all. Large is like a medium at domino's for like 20 bucks more and not as good. Never wasting my money here again.

name: M S
text: Hands down the best pizza around. A little expensive but you get what you pay for.

text: I gotta say this üçï comes in second place after Valentinos, here in Perris. But is way better than Pizza Hut.

text: Very good spot to get a fresh pizza in perris, definitely stands out from the rest, highly recommend.
